text.div:
Adjustment Deletion Code

This field distinguishes original from adjusted or deleted PDE records so CMS can adjust claims and make accurate payment for revised PDE records. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/adjstmtdltncd

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/adjstmt-dltn-cd defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Blank Original PDEOriginal PDE
A AdjustmentAdjustment
D DeletionDeletion
R ResubmittedResubmitted

name: Adjustment Deletion Code
title: Adjustment Deletion Code
description: This field distinguishes original from adjusted or deleted PDE records so CMS can adjust claims and make accurate payment for revised PDE records. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/adjstmt_dltn_cd
